channel.title: HELP with no-ip
channel.description:
I need help with no-ip. I port forwarded for my router and my comps firewall, and it did work fine. I was gone for 2 days and I come back and it doesnt work anymore? [code][Mon 19:45] Checking Remote IP Address. [Mon 19:45] Current IP address found, [/code] I assume that means it is working correctly, and it says [code][Mon 19:52] Updating host: [Mon 19:52] : DNS is current, no update needed.[/code] which I also assume is working correctly. I opened a support ticket and all they had to say is "Are you sure it is using the right router IP" and "Is the update client finding the IP correctly" Now, while i was gone, my IP changed, but I don't think that is a problem.
anybody?

item.title: HELP with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I need help with no-ip. I port forwarded for my router and my comps firewall, and it did work fine. I was gone for 2 days and I come back and it doesnt work anymore?

[Mon 19:45] Checking Remote IP Address. [Mon 19:45] Current IP address found,
I assume that means it is working correctly, and it says

[Mon 19:52] Updating host: [Mon 19:52] : DNS is current, no update needed.
which I also assume is working correctly. I opened a support ticket and all they had to say is “Are you sure it is using the right router IP” and “Is the update client finding the IP correctly”
Now, while i was gone, my IP changed, but I don’t think that is a problem.

anybody?

Read full topic
